title: Missing Mastery Token
body: I recently, about a week ago, achieved an S+ rank in a game as Vladimir. I moved to the craft tab after the match, and the token had disappeared! Now normally I wouldn't think twice over the situation. I just gained another token for Nasus, and if this is a bug I've encountered I'd rather not lose another one, you know?

replies.body:
Was this in a Normal/Ranked Summoner's Rift match? It's not possible to earn Mastery Tokens on any of the rotating game modes, Twisted Treeline, or Howling Abyss.

If so, can you link me the match that this happened on?
